'''Hafiz al-Milhab''' was an [[efreeti]] overseer on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.History: Hafiz was the overseer of a mine in the Elemental Plane of Fire, where efreet put enslaved [[azer]]s to work. In 1373 DR, his mine was attacked by [[Kaanyr Vhok]] and his allies, who had forged an agreement with azer leaders. Hafiz was killed by Kaanyr despite his promise of a better agreement.
